review:
He is a very good human being. Polite in nature and listens to the child's parents minutely. Always takes the call and if any emergency rise he gives special appointment. Dr Puneet Goenka Sir is next to God to us.

-----Parents of Mouditya De
He is an  amazing dr. Behaviour is very good.I always take appointment for my baby,any serious condition he can handle wonderfully. He take call at midnight also.i always get help from him.
** ** *** ** ******my daughter is a patient of his...he save her life..I recommend ebery one for Dr. Goenka.
